topics.body:
Call me crazy, but I thought of something: you remember how I was talking about the vita and how it was pushed to legacy a while back?  What is probably going to happen years from now is that a lot of the vita games that belong to companies that are still around are probably going to make pc ports then shove it on steam or such for overpriced prices for ports of old games.

A lot of companies are doing that shit lately; a lot of companies right now are taking their older games and shoving it to pc ports.


It's just a bit of opinion, but chances are one or two of the current console lines will probably wind up without a new console and chances are when that happens all their current games will be shoved to pc.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
